org.openbel.framework.common.xbel.parser
Interface XMLValidator

All Known Implementing Classes:
XBELValidator
public interface XMLValidator

Defines an XML validator to validate for well-formed and rule-conforming XML.

Author:
Anthony Bargnesi <abargnesi@selventa.com>

Method Summary
 boolean isValid(File file)
          Returns true if the provided file is valid XML, false otherwise.
 boolean isValid(Source source)
          Returns true if the provided source is valid XML, false otherwise.
 boolean isValid(String string)
          Returns true if the provided string is valid XML, false otherwise.
 void validate(File f)
          Validates the provided XML file against this validator's schema.
 void validate(File f, Result r)
          Validates the provided XML file against this validator's schema, placing XML results in the provided object r.
 void validate(Source s)
          Validates the provided XML source against this validator's schema.
 void validate(Source s, Result r)
          Validates the provided XML source against the validator's schema, placing XML results in the provided object r.
 void validate(String s)
          Validates the provided XML string against this validator's schema.

          Validates the provided XML string against this validator's schema, placing XML results in the provided object r.

validate

void validate(String s)
              throws SAXException,
                     IOException
Validates the provided XML string against this validator's schema.

Parameters:
s - String to validate against the schema; assumed to be non-null
Throws:
SAXException - Thrown by the SAX error handler, or if a fatal error occurred; an embedded exception may be present in the SAX exception, see SAXException.getException()
IOException - Thrown by the underlying reader (or stream) processing the XML string

validateWithErrors

List<SAXParseException> validateWithErrors(String s)
                                           throws SAXException,
                                                  IOException
Validates the provided XML strings against this validator's schema.

Parameters:
s - String to validate against the schema; assumed to be non-null
Returns:
A non-null list of SAX parse exceptions
Throws:
SAXException - Thrown by the SAX error handler, or if a fatal error occurred; an embedded exception may be present in the SAX exception, see SAXException.getException()
IOException - Thrown by the underlying reader (or stream) processing the XML string

              throws SAXException,

Validates the provided XML file against this validator's schema.

Parameters:

Throws:

IOException - Thrown by the underlying stream processing the XML file

validate

void validate(String s,
              Result r)
              throws SAXException,
                     IOException
Validates the provided XML string against this validator's schema, placing XML results in the provided object r.

Parameters:
s - String to validate against the schema; assumed to be non-null
r - The result object that receives the XML; may be null
Throws:
IOException - Thrown by the underlying reader (or stream) processing the XML string
SAXException - Thrown by the SAX error handler, or if a fatal error occurred; an embedded exception may be present in the SAX exception, see SAXException.getException()

validate

void validate(File f,
              Result r)
              throws SAXException,
                     IOException
Validates the provided XML file against this validator's schema, placing XML results in the provided object r.

Parameters:
f - File to validate against the schema; assumed to be non-null and readable
r - The result object that receives the XML; may be null
Throws:
IOException - Thrown by the underlying stream processing the XML file SAXException.getException()
SAXException - Thrown by the SAX error handler, or if a fatal error occurred; an embedded exception may be present in the SAX exception, see SAXException.getException()
